title: Ranked Issue
body: Today I played 3 of my games for my series to Silver, I won two of 5 and lost one and after the single loss was told I'd been unsuccessful in completing my series?  How does this make sense.

replies.body: It looks like there were a couple queue dodges before you accepted the match which was lost. Keep in mind that [**dodging a queue for a ranked match**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760#h2q2) automatically counts as a loss.
